snippet: Bernhard Langer shot a six-under-par 64 on Saturday to move to 10 under for the tournament, putting him ahead of a big-name field by four strokes.
lead_paragraph: Bernhard Langer shot a six-under-par 64 on Saturday to move to 10 under for the tournament, putting him ahead of a big-name field by four strokes.

headline.seo: Langer Leads by Four at U.S. Senior Open
headline.main: Langer Leads by Four at U.S. Senior Open
headline.print_headline: Langer Leads by Four At U.S. Senior Open
